addon:addon.name: UPnP Control Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding acts as a UPnP Control Point that can query media server content directories and serve content to media renderers.

parameter.name: path
parameter.label: Storage Path
parameter.description: Folder path for playlists and favourites. If not set, it will default to $OPENHAB_USERDATA/upnpcontrol. The folder will be created on first use when it does not exist.
